resources.string: The activity wil contiain the list of tracks which user marked as Loved. The tracks will be displayed in a grid view with album covers and song titles. Album covers will be clickable, and the user may listen to the music when click on the album cover
In this activity the user may choose the shop and buy the album or a single from artists he already listens to, or he may search for any artists he wants.
Playlist will contain a list view of user\'s playlist. When in the playlist, a user may choose which playlist to play or he may create, delete and add new playlist
Tracks will contain a list view of all user\'s tracks. On click, the track will play. It is possible to add here another menu, so the user can group tracks by album, author, singer, etc

In the market, I would use the following library: https://github.com/anjlab/android-inapp-billing-v3\n First, I would add repository and dependency in build.gradle, then add permision in Android Manifest. I would also create license key from Google Play. Then I would apply payment function to my app, by following the instructions in the github repository.
